name: Space Nomad (devtardigrade)
description:
The Space Nomad is the main character, the captain of a space ship lost in a hostile galaxy. To turn on the warp drive and make a "jump" into another galaxy, you need to collect all the containers with fuel.

Everything is complicated by the fact that the ship turns only 90 degrees and it takes only 60 seconds to complete each level.

As you move to the finish line of the game, you will be hindered by space anomalies, asteroids and intelligent enemies.

We will prepare several dozen more dynamic levels very soon.

Good luck!
